Not sure if I mentioned this before but I own an email list for writers 
who have a special fondness for fantasy/ s/f, and paranormal things in 
general.  A lot of the discussions are interesting and you'll always 
find plenty of info on which publisher are buying what so for those of 
you who want to branch out into original fiction and who love  adding 
elements that are a bit out there please feel free to join PNwriters at 
yahoogroups..

A bunch of you guys  (and you know who you are )  are definitely good 
enough to be published and if you like to or want to write  some 
seriously smutty stuff the market for that is a big one not only in 
E-books  but print publishers are picking up on it sooooo....

-- Barb (whose ability to write serious smut is as bad her non existent 
action scene writing ability)
